metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31606 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) issue was discovered in the sanitize_html function of redcloth gem v4.0.0. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a crafted payload.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31606` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-redcloth - 4.3.2-4ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-redcloth package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-4ubuntu0.22.04.1').
